Determine Data Frequencies for Symbols

Source: R/wp_data.r
in_determine_symbol_frequencies.Rd

Internal function that determines the frequency (yearly/quarterly) for each symbol in the formula.

Used by: in_data_one_formula Uses: None

Features:

  • Frequency detection

  • Warning for missing data

  • Multiple symbol handling

  • NA for unknown frequencies

Usage

in_determine_symbol_frequencies(data, symbols)

Arguments

data

data.frame; input dataset

symbols

character; vector of symbols to check

Value

character vector of frequencies
